forum.name: T6D1 Discussion: Share Your Reactions to the CCIQ
forum.intro:
Discussion: Your Reactions to completing the Classroom Critical Incident Questionnaire

Based on your experiences in completing Brookfield’s CCIQ, please post the following for discussion with your peers.

  • Share your thoughts about this reflection tool, considering that the questions are focused on abstract feelings and reactions.
  • Would you use a similar questionnaire with your students?  Why or why not?

After you post, please take time to review others' introductions in the discussion, and post at least one reply in response.

Note: This item will automatically mark itself complete on the main course outline once you have submitted a post.

Once You Have Completed Your Post:

Click on an Intro-Assessment-ABE link at the top (or at left under "my Courses") to return to the Course Outline and access the next course activity.
